languages.text: "Я, Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, приветствую агента Золотого Трона на своем судне и обязуюсь помочь в борьбе со злом, что грозит Человечеству".

traits.locale_text: "Я, Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, приветствую агента Золотого Трона на своем судне и обязуюсь помочь в борьбе со злом, что грозит Человечеству".

languages.text: "I, Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, welcome the agent of the Golden Throne aboard my ship and take on the responsibility of assisting him in the fight against the evil that threatens Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Я, Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, приветствую агента Золотого Трона на своем судне и обязуюсь помочь в борьбе со злом, что грозит Человечеству".

traits.locale_text: "I, the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, welcome the agent of the Golden Throne aboard my ship and take on the responsibility to assist him in the fight against the evil that threatens humanity."
"I, the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, welcome the agent of the Golden Throne aboard my ship and take on the responsibility to assist him in the fight against the evil that threatens humanity."

"I, Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, welcome the agent of the Golden Throne aboard my ship and take on the responsibility of assisting him in the fight against the evil that threatens Humanity."

languages.text: 「自由開拓者{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、我が船に黄金の玉座のエージェントを迎え入れ、人類を脅かす悪との戦いで彼を支援する責任を全うしよう」
languages.original_text: "I, Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, welcome the agent of the Golden Throne aboard my ship and take on the responsibility of assisting him in the fight against the evil that threatens Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、我が船に黄金の玉座のエージェントを迎え入れ、人類を脅かす悪との戦いで彼を支援する責任を全うしよう」

languages.text: “我，行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，欢迎黄金王座的代理人登上我的舰船，愿意协助他一同对抗人类之敌。”
languages.original_text: "I, Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, welcome the agent of the Golden Throne aboard my ship and take on the responsibility of assisting him in the fight against the evil that threatens Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “我，行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，欢迎黄金王座的代理人登上我的舰船，愿意协助他一同对抗人类之敌。”

languages.text: «Yo, {name}, Comerciante Independiente de la dinastía von Valancius, le doy la bienvenida a bordo al agente del Trono Dorado y asumo la responsabilidad de ayudarlo en la lucha contra el mal que amenaza a la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "I, Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, welcome the agent of the Golden Throne aboard my ship and take on the responsibility of assisting him in the fight against the evil that threatens Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «Yo, {name}, Comerciante Independiente de la dinastía von Valancius, le doy la bienvenida a bordo al agente del Trono Dorado y asumo la responsabilidad de ayudarlo en la lucha contra el mal que amenaza a la Humanidad».

languages.text: « Moi, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, j'accueille l'agent du Trône d'Or à bord de mon vaisseau et endosse la responsabilité de l'assister dans le combat contre le mal qui menace l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "I, Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, welcome the agent of the Golden Throne aboard my ship and take on the responsibility of assisting him in the fight against the evil that threatens Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « Moi, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, j'accueille l'agent du Trône d'Or à bord de mon vaisseau et endosse la responsabilité de l'assister dans le combat contre le mal qui menace l'humanité. »

languages.text: "Ich, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, heiße den Agenten des Goldenen Throns an Bord meines Schiffs willkommen und übernehme die Verantwortung, ihn im Kampf gegen das Böse, das die Menschheit bedroht, zu unterstützen."
languages.original_text: "I, Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, welcome the agent of the Golden Throne aboard my ship and take on the responsibility of assisting him in the fight against the evil that threatens Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Ich, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, heiße den Agenten des Goldenen Throns an Bord meines Schiffs willkommen und übernehme die Verantwortung, ihn im Kampf gegen das Böse, das die Menschheit bedroht, zu unterstützen."

languages.text: "Ben, Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius, Altın Taht'ın vekilini gemime almaktan ve İnsanlığı tehdit eden kötülüğe karşı savaşında ona yardım etme sorumluluğunu üstlenmekten memnuniyet duyarım."
languages.original_text: "I, Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, welcome the agent of the Golden Throne aboard my ship and take on the responsibility of assisting him in the fight against the evil that threatens Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Ben, Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius, Altın Taht'ın vekilini gemime almaktan memnuniyet duyuyorum ve İnsanlığı tehdit eden kötülüğe karşı savaşında ona yardım etme sorumluluğunu kabul ediyorum."
